categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Kronn was an officer who served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Kronn captained the Star Destroyer Adjudicator, which was present during the Rebel assault on Cymoon 1's Weapons Factory Alpha.

Kronn was a member of the Imperial Navy. During the Galactic Civil War, Kronn became captain of the Star Destroyer Adjudicator. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the vessel was deployed to blockade the moon Cymoon 1 after a party of Rebels attacked Weapons Factory Alpha, the Galactic Empire's weapons manufacturing facility on the moon. The Adjudicator attempted to prevent the Rebels escaping from the moon in the Millennium Falcon, but their efforts failed. Kronn reported the failure to the Sith Lord Darth Vader over comlink. As Captain Kronn reported, Vader choked the officer through the Force, ending the communication.
Kronn was created by Jason Aaron for Star Wars 3, a comic book released in 2015.
